tasks.title: Implement CLAUDE.md Simplification & FEATURES.json Migration Plan
tasks.description: Complete system overhaul: 1) Simplify CLAUDE.md from 800+ to ~300 lines removing complex protocols, 2) Rename TODO.json to FEATURES.json with approval workflow, 3) Update stop-hook.js references, 4) Refactor taskmanager API for feature management only, 5) Integrate native TodoWrite as primary task management, 6) Maintain quality standards without over-engineering. Deploy 6 concurrent agents for multi-component implementation.

tasks.title: Refactor taskmanager-api.js to feature-only management system
tasks.description: Transform taskmanager-api.js from task management to exclusive feature management with strict approval workflow. Remove all task management endpoints (init, create, complete, claim). Implement feature lifecycle: suggest-feature, approve-feature, reject-feature, list-features, feature-stats. Replace TODO.json with FEATURES.json. Enforce suggested → approved → implemented status flow.

tasks.title: Execute TODO.json to FEATURES.json migration with new approval workflow schema
tasks.description: Migrate TODO.json to FEATURES.json with new schema supporting suggested/approved/implemented status workflow. Create backup, transform data structure, validate migration success.

tasks.description: Design and implement comprehensive database schema changes to support embedded subtasks system with proper relationships, success criteria tracking, research guidance, and audit requirements. tasks.title: Research success criteria endpoints integration for quality management systems
tasks.description: Research and design success criteria endpoints integration for task quality management. Research areas: 1) Quality Gate Systems - how modern systems implement quality criteria, 2) Success Criteria Templates - 25-point audit system integration patterns, 3) Project-Wide Inheritance - how global criteria propagate to individual tasks, 4) Validation Workflows - automated vs manual criteria validation patterns, 5) Reporting Dashboard - success criteria tracking and reporting mechanisms. API Design Focus: POST /api/success-criteria/task/:taskId endpoint design, POST /api/success-criteria/project-wide endpoint patterns, GET /api/success-criteria/:taskId response structures, Integration with existing audit workflow. Deliverables: Success criteria API specification, Integration workflow design, Validation pattern recommendations, Dashboard data requirements.

API Design Focus: POST /api/success-criteria/task/:taskId endpoint design, POST /api/success-criteria/project-wide endpoint patterns, GET /api/success-criteria/:taskId response structures, Integration with existing audit workflow. tasks.title: CRITICAL: Comprehensive Puppeteer Testing - Absolute Perfection Required
tasks.description: Comprehensive testing of the entire codebase using Puppeteer with persistent single tab on single browser. ULTIMATE TESTING MANDATE: Test EVERY page, click EVERY button, use EVERY feature with authentic user simulation including realistic pauses between interactions. PERFECTION STANDARD: Everything must work, look professional and modern with unified color scheme. CRITICAL REQUIREMENTS: 1) Screenshot documentation at EVERY step - before/after each action 2) Console log capture and analysis for ALL interactions 3) Professional UI validation - NO white text on white background, text must be black/visible/clear, backgrounds lighter colored 4) Error Protocol: If ANY errors found, create new tasks with HIGHER PRIORITY to fix immediately 5) Authentic user behavior with pauses between page transitions and clicks 6) Use existing Puppeteer tests if available, do not create new ones 7) Visual quality assurance - unified color scheme, professional appearance 8) ONLY ABSOLUTE COMPLETION PERFECTION ACCEPTED. Quality Requirements: Professional, slick, modern appearance with clear visibility. Focus: Puppeteer tests are PRIMARY FOCUS until perfection achieved.
